profile:
**21 YEARS EXPERIENCED TAPING, DRYWALL, FRAMING, PAINTING & RENOVATIONS SERVICING**

- Free Estimation 
- Complete taping, mudding and sanding services 
- Renovations in basements, upper/lower floors, storage rooms, etc 
- Stucco ceiling removal 
- Smooth ceiling 
-Level 5 finishing 
- All touch-ups including cracks and small patches 
- Renovations including tearing down drywall and putting new drywall and taping work
-Painting 
- Framing 
-Commercial Work

There's no job too big or small for us

Guaranteed Satisfaction.

References available upon request.

Call for a free estimation, I can gladly come to your home and provide a cost-free in-home estimation

Romildo Da Silva serving the GTA AREA

(416) 996-1972
name: Silva Taping & Drywall

profile:
Reliable Choice Painters and Drywall is a privately owned and corporately managed general contracting company.

We provide Commercial and Residential renovation services, that also includes framing, drywall installation & finishing and pride 
ourselves in delivering the highest quality construction service at a competitive price/rate, for businesses and home owners, within 
the the GTA, and Western Ontario.

Our services can also be tailored to suite your needs,  or the specific service demand of your business or home. 

Our staff are well trained, motivated and supported by knowledgeable operation managers and supervisors to ensure timely 
completion and the highest quality standard of service. 

We invest in our team so that we can invest in you..!!
name: Reliable Choice Painters and Drywall
